statements: UPDATE DiseaseOutbreakPredictions SET outbreak_prediction = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreakPredictions SET population_health_data = 'Low', environmental_factor = 'Drought' WHERE location = 'City A';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreakPredictions SET outbreak_prediction='High' WHERE location='City A' AND environmental_factor='Pollution';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreakPredictions SET population_health_data='Good', outbreak_prediction='Low' WHERE location='City B';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET reported_cases = 50 WHERE outbreak_id = 1;
UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET factor_value = 8.2, recorded_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE location = 'City A' AND factor_type = 'Air Quality';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET reported_cases = reported_cases + 10 WHERE location = 'New York' AND disease_name = 'COVID-19';
UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET factor_value = 7.8, recorded_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE location = 'California' AND factor_type = 'Air Quality';
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET environmental_factor = 'Air Pollution' WHERE disease_id = 1;
UPDATE PopulationHealthData SET population_health_status = 'Good', population_density = 500 WHERE population_id = 3;
UPDATE DiseaseOutbreaks SET population_health_data = 'High' WHERE disease_name = 'Malaria';
UPDATE PopulationHealthData SET population_health_status = 'Critical', population_density = 1000 WHERE population_name = 'CityA';
UPDATE DiseaseCases SET num_cases = 100 WHERE disease_name = 'Influenza' AND location = 'City A';
UPDATE PopulationHealth SET population_size = 5000, health_condition = 'Good' WHERE location = 'City B' AND health_id = 123;
UPDATE DiseaseCases SET num_cases = 100 WHERE location = 'New York' AND disease_name = 'COVID-19';
UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60 WHERE location = 'California' AND date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE DiseaseCases SET number_of_cases = 100 WHERE location = 'City A' AND disease_name = 'Flu';
UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET temperature = 30.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE location = 'City B';
UPDATE DiseaseCases SET number_of_cases = 1000 WHERE location = 'New York' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET temperature = 28.5, humidity = 75.2 WHERE id = 3;
